title: Bolognese sauce
ingredients: ['1 dessertspoon vegetable oil', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 onion, finely chopped', '500g beef mince', '2 carrots, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '250ml beef stock', '1/2 tsp salt', '1/4 tsp pepper', '1/4 tsp dried herbs']
